Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Temporin-1Vc (XXA; Leu-rich; UCLL1c; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; Inactive: Temporin-1PRb MIC >100 uM)
Sequence Information.Source: the carpenter frog,Rana virgatipes, North America

Literature Information.Literature: Chemical modification:  C-terminal amidation.Activity: Active against S. aureus NCTC8325 (MIC 5 uM), MRSA T7/20 (MIC 10 uM),  S. epidermidis RP62A (MIC 10 uM), E. faecalis ATCC 29212 (MIC 40 uM), Streptococcus group B HNTCC 80130 (MIC 40 uM), E.coli ATCC25922 (MIC>160 uM), K. pneumoniae KK3 9904 (MIC 80 uM), P.aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC 160 uM), E. cloacae HNTCC 53001(MIC 40 uM), C.albicans (MIC>160 uM).Toxicity: moderate hemolytic HC50 30 uM. Updated 5/2020; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Abraham B, Sonnevend A, Jouenne T, Cosette P, Leprince J, Vaudry H, Bevier CR.2005
Literature Information.Title: Purification and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from the skin secretions of the carpenter frog Rana virgatipes (Ranidae, Aquarana).
